author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nexgo to pay 2017 dividend
text:
April 20(Reuters) - Nexgo Inc
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 1.499877 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 7.999346 new shares for every 10 shares for 2017, to shareholders of record on April 24
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 25 and the cash dividend will be paid on April 25
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/VobWA4
